name: maptheaccused
description: Fraud Case Visualization System - A comprehensive web application for visualizing accused individuals in fraud cases

scripts.install-all: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && yarn install
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && python server.py" "cd frontend && yarn start"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && python -m pytest" "cd frontend && yarn test"

author: MapTheAccused Team
